name: NPR
text:
The Trump administration's resumption of federal executions has put it in conflict with the Catholic Church, which in recent decades has vigorously opposed capital punishment.
 https://t.co/2DwEfgoUZd

name: NPR
text:
Police are investigating after the Anne Frank memorial in Boise was vandalized with swastikas. "Bad actors who use racist and violent rhetoric are not welcome in this community," Mayor Lauren McLean said.
https://t.co/f4Ibi0i2gb
